title: Samsung brings One UI 4.1 to the Galaxy S20 FE 5G, Galaxy M52, Galaxy A90, and the Galaxy A42
content:
Samsung has been working hard to deliver the sweet delight of One UI 4.1 to its smartphones and tablets across various price brackets. After delivering the latest iteration of its custom skin based on Android 12 for the flagships, the Korean OEM has started updating mid-ranger devices one by one. The Galaxy M52 5G and

The post Samsung brings One UI 4.1 to the Galaxy S20 FE 5G, Galaxy M52, Galaxy A90, and the Galaxy A42 appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung has started rolling out the stable One UI 4.1 update to the Galaxy S20 FE 5G, Galaxy A42 5G, Galaxy A90, and the Galaxy M52. Read on!
